DeviceClass.description: DeviceType GUID rendered by iLO for certain items iLO knows how to flash, and omitted for all other items.

DeviceContext.description: Friendly text string - same as 'Location' in fw inventory - omitted if not available.

DeviceInstance.description: UEFI Device Path if a PCI Device - omitted otherwise.

Targets.description: An array of possible target GUIDs (basically iLO makes educated guesses).  A client can match any one of these to a GUID in a component item to link current/available version information.

items.description: A GUID indicating iLO's knowledge of a possible correlation GUIDs vs. components.

title: #HpeiLOSoftwareInventory.v2_0_0.HpeiLOSoftwareInventory
